text:
──... Now, onto the next question. I heard that this time,
the costumes are matching for all 283 Production members.

Do you have any thoughts
on everyone wearing the same design?
──I feel like we need to move more dynamically.

While unit costumes often have different designs
for each member, that's not the case this time.

So that when we all come together,
it's immediately recognizable as 'Mitsumine'!

We need to perform more clearly and attractively!
It really fires up my determination!

(... It's obvious, but when they're not
fooling around, they're quite serious...──)

I always give it my all,
aiming to captivate the audience!
